utils module¶

Client side utility functions for Messenger app.

utils.get_chunk(text, size)¶

Get chunk and residue from received text.

utils.make_presence_action_and_data(client_name)¶
utils.parse_args()¶

Create a command line argument parser and add arguments to it. :param (Tuple) args: Tuple with arguments for parser. :return (argparse.Namespace): Namespace with added arguments.

utils.set_socket_info(addr, port)¶
